mapper.select: SELECT u.username ,CONCAT( u.name , '/' , c.content , '/' , IFNULL(d.text, '미발령') , ' <' , u.username , '>') AS text FROM user u JOIN code c ON u.`position` = c.name LEFT JOIN department d ON u.parent = d.id;
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO file (code_name, ori_filename, new_filename, type, pk_idx) VALUES (#{code_name}, #{ori_filename}, #{new_filename}, #{type}, #{pk_idx})
